{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3455493,"name":"Spires Robotics","username":"nathan_bui","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/nathan_bui/{size}/236126_2.png","created_at":"2024-12-05T23:38:38.673Z","cooked":"

Hihi!! It‚Äôs the Spires teams weekly blog, and we‚Äôve come with new stuff to bring!! Well, with prototyping for a box grabber. You know, like a thing that grabs boxes! Anyways, pre-season is almost over, so now we gotta hurry up on these prototypes.

[TUESDAY, DECEMBER 3RD]

For Tuesday, we got a new member!! He is coding, along with Benjamin and Noah. Welcome Micheal!!

IMG_14554032√ó3024 2.33 MB

(Micheal and Coach Mike setting up his coding account)

Last blog, someone told to show the prototypes, so I will!! i finally got the pictures of them lmao

IMG_14634032√ó3024 3.23 MB

Everett‚Äôs!! His is uh‚Ä¶ going!

IMG_14624032√ó3024 2.67 MB

Nathan‚Äôs prototype, it‚Äôs alright, but what the heck is that.

IMG_14604032√ó3024 3.57 MB

IMG_14594032√ó3024 3.26 MB

Mine and Leah‚Äôs prototype! Leah wasn‚Äôt here on Tuesday, so i had to improvise with Coach Scott, as we had to continue making it without the plan, cause Leah had the sketch and couldn‚Äôt send it to us via textü•≤ but it‚Äôs all good!! planning to do more next tuesday. It‚Äôs hard to understand everything since the photos suck, but basically all we did to it was connect the 3 plastic boards together, then couldn‚Äôt go any farther since no plan. The black box is the box everyone is prototyping for!

IMG_14584032√ó3024 2.8 MB

Mattea and Janet‚Äôs prototype! In all honesty, their prototype is the best‚Ä¶ and will probably win the competition for whose prototype we go along with.

Now for the rest of the photos I got!

IMG_14534032√ó3024 1.63 MB

IMG_14474032√ó3024 2.5 MB

Everett building and using the bandsaw. He could use a little more practice with it‚Ä¶

IMG_14564032√ó3024 2.91 MB

THEY GOT A TV. THEY SOMEHOW GOT A WHOLE TV AND STARTED USING IT. FOR WHAT? HOW?? WE HAD A TV??

IMG_14464032√ó3024 2.27 MB

IMG_14514032√ó3024 2.71 MB

IMG_14494032√ó3024 3.61 MB

Silly photos, Coach Scott and Nathan, Mattea, and more Nathan!

IMG_14444032√ó3024 2.43 MB

IMG_14404032√ó3024 3.02 MB

IMG_14424032√ó3024 2.67 MB

These guys were practicing coding and 3d modeling im pretty sure, and they were all focused! I‚Äôm glad one group of people were (i sure wasn‚Äôt after 7:20).

For Thursday, there was nothing. No robotics!! We had a snow day and therefore robotics shut down too
